test-case.name: resize-test
test-case.objective: Verify that the application window can resize.
test-case.input: Using the window manager handles, resize the window
test-case.output: The content of the window should use all space.

test-case.name: load-test
test-case.objective: Verify that the application can load data
test-case.input: select load from the file menu and chose an image file
test-case.output: The content of the file should be loaded into the program.

test-case.name: save-test
test-case.objective: Verify that the application can save drawings in png
test-case.input: Draw a nice drawing, then chose file->save and type the name test.png
test-case.output: The image should be saved in the PNG format.
